attributes.action: more afordable housing for young families in seaford
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned are concerned citizens who urge our leaders to act now to create more affordable housing for young people.

I as many other young people have now been homeless for over a year with my 10 month old son, living on my mother’s sofa! It is very frustrating and depressing knowing that the council is offering people to buy their properties when they are not prepared to build any more affordable housing for young people and young families.
We need to have more affordable housing in Seaford as the town is growing.
I urge and would appreciate your signatures as we need as much support as we can get.
